most_active_tickets.title: Adding a script language to the supported languages
Unable to open Pieces Copilot Service

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Errors and Feature Requests
common_issues.description: Users report various issues with Pieces OS, including app launch failures, error messages, and feature requests. Troubleshooting steps involve gathering system information, checking for software conflicts, and providing logs. Solutions range from bug fixes to implementing new features based on user feedback.

related_issues.title: Adding a script language to the supported languages
related_issues.text:
Adding a script language to the supported languages ### Discussed in https://github.com/pieces-app/support/discussions/1
Originally posted by **ddasberg** January 21, 2025 Is it possible to add a script language to the supported languages? If so, what kind of files or information are necessary? We have develeoped a script-language for database-applications for Windows named "CARA". Our complete Windows-ERP-System has been written in CARA. It would be nice to have Pieces-support for the language.
## GitHub issue summary: **Key points:** * User @ddasberg created an issue requesting a new feature. * The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the Pieces team. * The Pieces team responded within the promised 24 hours. * The Pieces team added the feature request to the language support system. **Problems identified:** * The user needed a new feature. **Solutions proposed/implemented:** * The Pieces team added the feature request to the language support system. **Current status/outcome:** * The feature request is being reviewed by the Pieces team. **Additional details:** * The issue was created on 2025-01-21. * The Pieces team responded on 2025-01-21.

related_issues.title: Non-dismissable overlay message.
related_issues.text:
Non-dismissable overlay message.
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

v11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

My Pieces app launches at Windows startup (intended). Sometimes, (possibly after a background update?), this dialog appears on my desktop. I don't know what it means, exactly, but I cannot click "Ok" and there is no other way to dismiss it. My only option appears to be to restart the computer, which is often impractical. Please fix!

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f231ef56-3d59-4e94-8cb5-2b54249900cc)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation: Unable to Launch Pieces Windows Desktop Version

**Key points raised:**

* @ThemePark is unable to launch the Pieces Windows Desktop Version.
* This issue is similar to existing issues 546, 571, and 131.

**Problems identified:**

* The user cannot launch the Pieces Windows Desktop app.
* The cause of the issue is unclear.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* @Mack-at-Pieces asks for the user's Windows version and confirmation of installed software.
* No further solutions are proposed in the conversation excerpt.

**Current status/outcome:**

* The issue is currently being investigated by @Mack-at-Pieces.
* The outcome is unknown at this time.

**Additional information:**

* The user is directed to several resources, including existing issues, documentation, and a YouTube channel.

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Copilot Service
related_issues.text:
Unable to open Pieces Copilot Service
Error: HttpException: Connection closed before full header was received, uri = http://127.0.0.1:39300/model/2fca5f65-b3ce-459b-b394-0ea5de0b050d/download/progress

**Installation Details**

Succeeded: true
Path: C:\Program Files\WindowsApps\com.MeshIntelligentTechnologi.PiecesOS_11.0.4.0_x64__84gz00a5z79wr/os_server.exe

**PiecesOS Information**

ID: 62ded9e8-d9d0-490e-b34e-632516b3cf1a

User: Anonymous
Current Version: 11.0.4
Min Version Supported: 11.0.4
Max Version Supported: 12.0.0
Local Port: 39300

**Device Information**

Operating System: Windows
Current Version: "Windows 10 Home Single Language" 10.0 (Build 26100)
Min Version Supported: Windows 10 Build 1903
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* User @AmanSingh766 reported an issue with downloading local LLMs.
* The error message is "Connection closed before full header was received".
* The issue has been routed to the proper Pieces team member for investigation.

**Problems Identified:**

* User is unable to download local LLMs.
* The cause of the error is unknown.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* User has been asked to provide support logs.
* It has been suggested to check if the issue occurs with semua downloads or only a specific one.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The team is investigating the issue.
* No solution has been provided yet.

**Additional Notes:**

* The user has been provided with links to relevant resources.

recommendations: "Investigate Pieces OS Errors: Prioritize resolving the recurring issue of 'Pieces OS Errors and Feature Requests' as it has the highest frequency (3) and relates to app launch failures and error messages. This will directly impact user experience."

"Improve Communication on Overlay Message: Address the 'Non-dismissable overlay message' issue by providing clearer information to the user about the message's purpose and how to resolve or dismiss it. This will reduce user frustration."

"Gather More Data on Copilot Service Issue: For the 'Unable to open Pieces Copilot Service' issue, gather more data from users experiencing this, including their specific operating system versions and any recent software changes. This will help pinpoint the root cause."
